front.title: Diameter Support for EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP)

abstract.t: EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP) defines extensions to the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) to support efficient re- authentication between the peer and an EAP Re-authentication (ER) server through a compatible authenticator. This document specifies Diameter support for ERP. It defines a new Diameter ERP application to transport ERP messages between ER authenticator and ER server, and a set of new AVPs that can be used to transport the cryptographic material needed by the re-authentication server.
